verbose_text: The Arabidopsis gene CBF3 / DREB1A functioned in the stress tolerance pathway and substantially enhanced drought stress tolerance in highly susceptible indica rice cultivar Samba Mahsuri without affecting its agronomic traits.
evidence: DREB1A functioned in the stress tolerance pathway and substantially enhanced drought stress tolerance in highly susceptible indica rice cultivar Samba Mahsuri without affecting its agronomic traits
